(Scratch that, Firestarter isn't in this RPG.  Pyro, my other pyromaniac, 
shot the flames at Stegotron)

Bumblebee/Injector/Manterror/Ramhorn:


A cry from the Predacons went up as they saw the Oblitercons surge in.


Raising both of his launchers, Bumblebee fired two missiles from each, two at 
Striker, the other at Ramhorn.

---

Injector stood up, firing a missile at Ramulus, Ramulus' shots sending him 
slamming through a tree.

---

Manterror got to his feet slowly.  Raising one arm, he fired a single ion 
disk at Ramulus' torso, leaning against a tree for support.

---

Ramhorn went unconsciouss as the two stinger missiles blew up against him, 
sending him flying through the air a few feet, hitting the ground.
